document_data.name: Irrae
document_data.mainbody: '''Irrae''' was a navigator for [[Company Yargo]] stationed aboard the ''[[Buccaneer's Tear]]'' as of the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: She had an inquisitive mind and always looked out to discover the cause of nature's behavior.
document_data.History:
When the ''Buccaneer's Tear'' sailed up to [[Pirates' Skyhold]] above the [[Sea of Swords]] in the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, the ship landed near a dangerous swamp home to frightful bands of [[lizardfolk]]. Irrae set to journeying trough [[Vilebog]] swamp, collecting flora specimens, investigating floating motes of light, and even stealing distillation techniques from the local populace.

Irrae worked with [[Tragold|Scout Tragold]] and the [[Hero of Sleeping Dragon Bridge]] to repair the rope bridges that were found throughout the swamp, in order for their expedition to continue further into the searing [[earthmote]].
